Performer:
111.md (吉田栄光)

Alternate Name: Yoshida Tamaya (吉田玉也)

Dates: '1971-1979/04'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
